name: The Braves & Bows
description: The Braves & Bows is adventure platformer game in the open world. Here you can explore the castle and it's surroundings, placed on island that disconnected from other world. You should use a bow to fight with enemies that settled in the castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Storage: 200 MB available space
